articles.title: Munster rugby team hit by nine more COVID cases in South Africa - Eyewitness News

articles.title: How 2 Flights to Europe May Have Spurred Spread of New Variant - The New York Times
articles.description: A confounding array of Covid rules and lax enforcement of mask wearing may have sent on infected passengers on two KLM flights from South Africa to “who knows where.”
articles.content: After the emergence of the Omicron variant in Africa last week, the United States and the European Union and other nations banned flights from southern Africa. Israel and Morocco slammed their doors … [+2204 chars]

articles.title: Closest pair of supermassive black holes are spotted just 1,600 light years apart in the sky - Daily Mail
articles.description: Astronomers detected the two objects using the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope in Chile and said they were about 89 million light-years away from Earth.
